meta.note: Profile + 'about' answers for who-is queries (includes playful intro).

about: Chaitanya is an electronic device ðŸ˜œ Just kidding! Here you go:

Chaitanyachidambar Kulkarni is a Junior Software Engineer at iTriangle Infotech (Bengaluru), focused on Power BI, MySQL, Python ETL, and embedded live reporting. He built financial MIS and End-of-Line (EOL) testing dashboards, automated daily refresh via Gateway at 12 AM IST, parsed IMEI-level failure reasons, and deployed secure iFrame dashboards for internal/leadership use.
name: Chaitanyachidambar Kulkarni
summary: Results-driven Junior Software Engineer & Data Analyst with hands-on experience in Power BI, MySQL, Python ETL, and embedded live reporting. Built financial and testing dashboards, automated refresh pipelines, and deployed secure iFrame reports for leadership and investor-facing views.

business_intelligence: Power BI (Advanced DAX, dynamic slicers, epoch-based date logic, embedded dashboards)

experience.title: Junior Software Engineer
achievements: Built and deployed financial dashboards for device-wise, service-wise, and month-wise sales/purchase with margin and closing stock analysis.
Automated MySQL â†’ Power BI refresh using Python ETL; reduced manual reporting from hours to seconds; daily refresh begins 12:00 AM IST.
Created EOL testing dashboards (Stage 1 & 2) with IMEI-level failure reason parsing and model/date/stage slicers; epoch-based DAX for 'today by default'.
Deployed dashboards via secure website iFrame embedding; used internally and for leadership/investor viewing.
Standardized DAX measures and slicer behavior across reports for consistent UX.

experience.title: Data Analyst Intern
achievements: Gathered requirements with clients; built dashboards in Power BI/Tableau/Excel cutting report time by ~40%.
Cleaned and analyzed large datasets with Python & SQL; prepared PPT insights for stakeholders.

projects.name: Aprilâ€“May Financial Summary Dashboard
projects.purpose: Internal finance visibility for month-on-month performance.
details: Interactive summary of revenue, purchase, margin, and closing stock for Aprilâ€“May.
Month/Branch/Type slicers; daily & historical DAX measures.
Used internally by finance; baseline for later Q1 views.

projects.name: Q1 Performance Dashboard
projects.purpose: Leadership view of sales, purchase, and variance across months/branches.
details: Trend visuals with monthly comparisons; clean layout.
Deployed for leadership/investor viewing (website iFrame).

projects.name: Q1 Financial Summary Dashboard
details: P&L-style cards, Balance Sheet cues, and ratios (e.g., margin%); FG inventory and closing balance for OEM & After Market.
Internal deployment to finance team via Power BI Service.

projects.name: EOL Dashboard (Stage 1 & 2)
projects.purpose: Factory testing visibility at IMEI level.
details: Visual tables for Total Tested, Passed, Retested-Recovered, Failed.
Stage/Model/Date slicers; epoch-based 'today-by-default' filtering in DAX.
IMEI failure parsing by selecting tokens ending with ':0'; filters respect Stage 1/2.

projects.name: Failure Reason Parsing (EOL)
projects.purpose: Actionable failure insights for QA teams.
details: Parsed complex result strings (e.g., 'XYZ:0, ABC:1'); counted only true fail tokens ':0'.
Works with stage selector and model/date slicers; supports combined Stage 1 & 2 view.

projects.name: Live Data Pipeline Automation
details: Python ETL to fetch/clean/load MySQL data for BI; daily 12:00 AM IST refresh.
Fallback approach planned if direct connectors degrade.

projects.name: Website Dashboard Deployment
projects.purpose: Centralized access for internal & leadership/investor views.
details: Embedded dashboards using secure iFrame on company portal.
Right-click disabled/obfuscation as needed; uses Service auth.
Accurate live daily data via Service + Gateway.

projects.name: TatTvam â€” AI Chatbot (Personal Project)
projects.purpose: Public, recruiter-facing assistant that answers about Chaitanya and handles small talk & basic reasoning.
details: Client-only chatbot hosted on GitHub Pages; uses on-device WebLLM (no server APIs).
Knowledge base in structured JSON; lightweight keyword+fuzzy retrieval.
Small-talk pack for greetings, memes, jokes, and guardrails.
UI: chat window + quick chips; CTAs for resume/LinkedIn/email.
Deployed as static site; optional QR link on resume.
capabilities: Answers recruiter questions about skills, projects, and experience.
Handles casual conversation with humor, then guides back to career topics.
Basic reasoning/aptitude prompts; concise and professional tone.

projects.name: Fraud Detection Model (Personal)
details: RandomForestClassifier; ~97% accuracy with tuned hyperparameters.
Deployed via Streamlit for interactive predictions.

projects.name: Movie Recommendation System (Personal)
details: Content-based recommender using TF-IDF and cosine similarity; returns top-5 similar titles.

projects.name: SMS Spam Classifier (Personal)
details: NLP preprocessing + classifier to label SMS as spam/ham; evaluated with standard metrics.

deployment_summary.embedding: Power BI dashboards embedded via secure iFrame on company website.
deployment_summary.audience: Internal teams, leadership, and investor-facing views as required.
